history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Zmult_gt_compat_r. hauto use: Zmult_gt_reg_r, Z.mul_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zmult_gt_neg_compat_l,Zmult_gt_compat_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zmult_gt_neg_compat_l,Zmult_gt_compat_r,Z,Zgt_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zmult_gt_neg_compat_l,Zmult_gt_compat_r,Z,Zgt_trans,Zmult_gt_reg_r.

ctx: intros n m p Hp Hgt.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable p.

ctx: intros n m p Hp Hgt.
intros n m p Hp Hgt.
exceptions.tactic: apply Zgt_trans with (n := Z.mul p n) (m := Z.mul p m) (p := 0).
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n > m -> n * p > m * p H0 : forall n m p : Z, m > n -> 0 > p -> p * n > p * m n, m, p : Z H1 : (p * n ?= p * m) = Gt H2 : (p ?= 0) = Gt Unable to unify "p * n > 0" with "n > m".

ctx: intros n m p Hp Hgt.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable p.

original: intros n m p Hp Hgt. apply Zmult_gt_compat_r in Hgt. apply Zmult_gt_neg_compat_l in Hp. apply Zgt_trans with (n := Z.mul p n) (m := Z.mul p m) (p := 0). - apply Zmult_gt_reg_r; auto. - auto.
